content: Greetings! My name is Borodi Bogdan, but my closest friends call me Bob. I am a 19-year-old student from Bistrita, Romania - probably one of the smallest towns on earth - pursuing a Bachelor's Degree in Computer Science at Babeș-Bolyai University from Cluj Napoca.Welcome to my portofolio
